Articles.Content: I know you can put parachutes on solid rocket boosters in KSP. But how do I deploy them after I seperate the SRB\'s from the main body??

Put the Parachutes in the same stage as the decouplers for it to deploy...

Good luck with that advice
With updates, the parachutes should deploy even if placed in later stages they only deploy once they reach 500ft though, and they can get ripped off if you try to salvage too much

Put the Parachutes in the same stage as the decouplers for it to deploy...

Whoa, this works? Thought it didn\'t. Must test!

It totally works! I have no idea why I thought it didn\'t.
It never used to. It was a reasonably recent change.

Yeah, can a mod lock this thread now.

To prevent clutter and maybe chaos.
